# DirectionsConstructorOptions

**Interface**

Options that you may provide when creating a directions object.

## Declaration

```swift
interface DirectionsConstructorOptions
```

## Overview

Use [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/DirectionsConstructorOptions] to set options when creating a [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/Directions] object.

If you set `language` to a language ID, such as `fr-CA` or `en-GB`, MapKit JS returns step-by-step directions in the specified language, if available. If you don’t set `language` when initializing a [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/Directions] object, the directions default to the language ID you provide when initializing the map with [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/mapkit/init]. If the map doesn’t have a specified language upon initialization, MapKit JS returns directions in the browser’s language setting.

Set the `language` option when creating a [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/Directions] object as in the code below:

```javascript
const directions = new mapkit.Directions({
    language: "en-GB"
});
```

## Initializing language

- **language**: A language ID that determines the language for route information.

## Creating a directions object

- **new Directions(options)**: Creates a directions object with options you provide.
